title: New Champion/Skin Idea
body:
Not sure if this has ever been suggested.

How about having champions of the opposite gender to allow players to play both male and female counterpart.
Example:
Ashe (female), Ashe (male)
for characters such as Garen, slightly modify the name to make it feminine or just a female Garen.

Along with this eventually incorporate their respective skins into the opposite gender.
Being able to pick the opposite gender would be like purchasing a skin.

What do you think?

replies.body:
I think thats a lot more work than you think it is. Thats like 90% of a new champion you're asking there for each one.

All new voices, all new animations, all new models, which means all new skins. And in most cases they would need to redo the skills to adjust for the new model. They would also need to horribly twist names like bad puns.
